mapper.sql:
clinical_attribute_meta.ATTR_ID AS "${prefix}attrId", cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER AS "${prefix}cancerStudyIdentifier"
, clinical_attribute_meta.DISPLAY_NAME AS "${prefix}displayName", clinical_attribute_meta.DESCRIPTION AS "${prefix}description", clinical_attribute_meta.DATATYPE AS "${prefix}datatype", clinical_attribute_meta.PATIENT_ATTRIBUTE AS "${prefix}patientAttribute", clinical_attribute_meta.PRIORITY AS "${prefix}priority", clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID AS "${prefix}cancerStudyId"

INNER JOIN cancer_study ON clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID = cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID LEFT JOIN clinical_patient ON clinical_attribute_meta.ATTR_ID = clinical_patient.ATTR_ID LEFT JOIN patient ON clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID = patient.CANCER_STUDY_ID AND clinical_patient.INTERNAL_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID
INNER JOIN cancer_study ON clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID = cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID LEFT JOIN clinical_sample ON clinical_attribute_meta.ATTR_ID = clinical_sample.ATTR_ID

GROUP BY clinical_attribute_meta.ATTR_ID, cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER, clinical_attribute_meta.DISPLAY_NAME, clinical_attribute_meta.DESCRIPTION,clinical_attribute_meta.DATATYPE, clinical_attribute_meta.PATIENT_ATTRIBUTE, clinical_attribute_meta.PRIORITY, clinical_attribute_meta.CANCER_STUDY_ID
